title: Adaptive Control Design Workshop Based on Physical Information Neural Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service/in-service teachers aiming to master advanced control techniques applicable to practice, utilizing smartphone-based learning materials

learning_goals: Explain the PINNs model structure that combines physics-based models with data-driven learning
Implement procedures to approximate Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman equations using neural networks
Design adaptive control algorithms applicable to real-world systems (e.g., autonomous ship control)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
